What services does NileEdge offer?.answer: NileEdge Innovations offers services in AI solutions, data science, workflow automation, business intelligence, medical AI, and professional training tailored for businesses and institutions.

Where is NileEdge Innovations located?.answer: NileEdge Innovations is based in Lagos, Nigeria, at 17 Fatai Oloko Crescent.

How can I contact NileEdge?.answer: You can reach us via email at info@nileedgeinnovations.org or call us at +234 90 69210 225. We’re happy to hear from you!

Do you offer training for teams?.answer: Yes, NileEdge provides hands-on professional training for teams and organizations in Python, AI, and data analysis. Training can be customized to fit your goals.

Can individuals join your training progr.answer: Absolutely. We run open workshops and bootcamps in Data Science, Python, and AI for students, beginners, and professionals. Check our website for upcoming sessions.

What is your typical project timeline?.answer: Timelines depend on the scope. Small automation tasks may take a few days, while complex AI projects may take several weeks. We always communicate clear milestones.

Do you work with startups?.answer: Yes! NileEdge is passionate about empowering startups with scalable AI and data solutions tailored to their stage and growth trajectory.

What industries do you serve?.answer: We serve clients across healthcare, education, business intelligence, and digital transformation. Our solutions are flexible and industry-aware.

Do you build custom AI agents?.answer: Yes, we design and build intelligent AI agents and workflow automation systems to improve operational efficiency and reduce manual tasks.

Can you help improve my existing system?.answer: Definitely. We audit and modernize existing systems—whether it's automating reporting, upgrading dashboards, or embedding AI in your workflow.
